talk.chat:
Guard Erstack:
The shallow graves of exiled Tribal Chiefts! Most of those chiefs were murdered, but death could not contain their vengeful fury!
What? ...The Immortal Plateau? Who cares about Orcish tombs, anyway. A tomb's a tomb, right? We'll all get one eventually! Gah, it's cold! I just want a swig of Kofporch and my bed!
Return

Guard Erstack:
Hmm, how to explain it.... Basically, the ruins are haunted! At one time it was a thriving Orcish city, but now it's just a shell of its former self. Only inhabitants you'll find out there are evil spirits and insects! They say that if you bury a bottle of liquor under the ruins, you'll get an amazing Kofporch! I've heard there's even an old Kofporch jug buried under the Beacon Mound of Pa'agrio! If I could have a glass of that, I'd die a warm and happy man!
Return

Guard Erstack:
Brrr! It's freezing out here! Nothing like a mug of Kofporch to thicken the blood on a day like this. What? You've never heard of Kofporch? Where've you been, kiddo? Were you born yesterday?
Kofporch is only brewed in a few areas in Schuttgart Territory. The best kinds are then hauled out and left to age in either the Den of Evil or the Crypts of Disgrace. Dangerous? Sure! But believe you me, no imitation even comes close!
"Tell me about the Den of Evil."
"Tell me about the Crypts of Disgrace."
"Who is the lord of the manor and what is the tax rate?"
Quest
